mapper.insert: insert into member (Name, Id, Pw, Major, Student_Num, Email, Phone_Num) values(#{Name}, #{Id}, #{Pw}, #{Major}, #{Student_Num}, #{Email}, #{Phone_Num})
mapper.select: select Name, Id, Pw, Major, Student_Num, Email, Phone_Num from member where Id = #{Id} AND Pw = #{Pw}
select Id from member where Id = #{Id}
